articles.title: England vs Australia, 4th Ashes Test, Day 3 Highlights: Mark Wood Strikes Thrice After Jonny Bairsto.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: ENG vs AUS, 4th Ashes Test, Day 3 Highlights: Australia were 113 for 4 against England at Stumps on Day 3 of the 4th Ashes Test in Manchester.
articles.content: Australia took the beating in the park. They bowled well in the first couple of sessions but once Jonny Bairstow walked in, it turned out to a nightmare. In a blink of an eye, England took the lead o… [+575 chars]
